name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
description:
Maximum no of the skip levels to be maintained in the skip list for
    storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, it is set to 0 and a linear
    list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
description:
Support 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. To enable this feature, set the parameter
    to a positive number. The threadpool size is how many threads to dedicate
    to the running of these 'hedged', concurrent reads in your client.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.size
description:
Total size in bytes of Datanode blocks to get when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.connections
description:
Max allowed connections for the shuffle.  Set to 0 (zero)
               to indicate no limit on the number of connections.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.timeout-ms
description:
Timeout value for fetcher to retry to fetch again when some
  non-fatal failure happens because of some events like NM restart.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-directory-items
description:
Defines the maximum number of items that a directory may
      contain. Cannot set the property to a value less than 1 or more than
      6400000.
